content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard (downtown noblesville indiana) looking up at some pigeons flying around and noticed a dark spot in the sky thinking it was a balloon a kid let go.  as i kept looking at this spot it moved directly over my yard and i then noticed the way it was flying was strange (not like a balloon) and it looked disc shaped. it was sunny outside with a mild breaze and some clouds to the east.  i had my son bring me binoculars and i zoomed in on the object as it slowly flew over my yard from west to east and i clearly saw a black disc shaped object with triangles all around the edge, like a star pattern.  it was rotating slowly but appeared damaged as it was wobbly rotating but in a consistent pattern.  it definitely was not a balloon.  it was low enough to see it with my naked eyes and my neighbor came out and by that time it was too far away for him to see.  it appeared to go into the clouds from a distance. i got into my car to try and follow it but could not see it due to clouds.  i felt amazed at what i saw, disappointed my neighbor could not see it, but my son saw it too.
content.summary: Black disc with star-like triangles all around the edge, used my binoculars to get closer look.

content.detailedDescription: After turning out the lights, i noticed a "bright star" in a location where there are no planets or stars for this time of year. could see without my glasses, so i put on my glasses and after watching for about 10 minutes, woke my wife to look at it. she dismissed it as a helicopter, but after 10 more minutes of observation, did not appear to get closer or farther away. aroused wife again. she went outside and confirmed that it is just at treeline, but appears to "bobble" and sometimes makes a small circle. got my 20x80 binoculars-looks like a flashing white light. now appears to very slowly be going toward the horizon. but is still visable. i am an amateur astronomer and have never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Bright red-green-white twinkling planet-like light in nw sky low on horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I had just left littleton, co headed for ft. collins.  i was driving north on university blvd. and as i looked north above the treeline in the sky probly 35 to 45 degrees off the horizon something caught my eye.  i couldnt really get a good look at it for long enough before the road dipped and the object was obstructed by trees.  by the time the trees were no longer in the way i looked in the same spot and couldnt see anything.  i wasnt sure what i had seen until about another mile up the road i looked up the same area and i saw it again but this time it had moved probly five to ten miles westward.  i stared at it as much as i could while driving trying to decipher what it could be.  from my viewpoint, its apparent shape was that of a disc, but the object was probably 1500 to 2000 feet up in the air and at least a mile away from me, so it could have been a traingle or cylinder shape etc.  at first it appeared white against the blue sky, and it was slowing moving northwest.  but as it passed under a small group of clouds, it appeared to almost camoflauge itself with its backround.  it blended with the color of the clouds, and then as it passed back onto the blue backround of sky again it appeared to look blue.  i couldnt keep my eye on it the entire time because i was driving and there was no one else in the car to watch.  i looked at the road and then looked back and it was moving away very fast, it grew smaller and then it was gone.  it was a very clear day and there werent many clouds in the sky.  i am one hundred percent convinced that it was not a plane or jet or helicopter of any kind, it did not have the normal flight charachteristics that you would find in our known earthly arsenal.  afterward i saw a lot of activity in the area in the sky, but im not sure if the planes in the area were comercial planes or military planes or what.  i have read a lot on the subject of ufos but this is my first personal experiece seeing anything and i would like to know if anyone else saw it.
content.summary: While driving i saw a white disc shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother called and invited me and my son to go to the lake (south holston)that afternoon. it was a gorgeous day. i was trying to mow the yard and had given up cause my mower was not pulling. anyway we went to the lake. i usually take my camera. i don't know anything about photography. my camera is a kodak easy share point and shoot. 5 megapixels.

  i didn't even realize that this might be a ufo until i got home and downloaded the photos to the computer. my wife said it is a cloud, but the sky was a beautiful blue with no clouds. 

 and it is probably some sort of light reflection or something. but i have taken about a 1000 pictures up on the lake over the last several years and have never had anything ever show up on it.

  anyway make of it what you will. it very will may be some photgraphic boo boo. we didn't hear any sounds or anything.
content.summary: Me, my brother and my son were enjoying  the day on the lake.

content.detailedDescription: I took a picture of an area from my backyard overlooking a field with trees over 1000 ft away because i have been seeing objects for a few days over the area.  i got a photo of several ufo's some flying in a sort of pattern.  daylight at about 6 pm.  no noise. facing south.
content.summary: Several ufo's in one photo

content.detailedDescription:
last night i woke up at 4:00 am and noticed a light moving across the sky next to a star and then disappearing. it was a very clear night no clouds at all.

then i woke up this morning at 9:00 am i walked out on my patio and to my surprise i noticed that there were so many chemtrails! then i noticed the moon had a bright object next to it that was very large to the naked eye and it was not moving. i ran and got my camera and zoomed in to find what looks like a cigar shaped space ship of some kind! when i zoomed in it shape shifted and then it starts moving off to the distance to the west of lax and then disappears in a poof. but i did see it flying very far off into the distance at the end clip i recorded.
then it came back into site again and i recorded it for about 10 min and it was changing its shape
very slowly. it still may be there now.
content.summary: Lax ufo.

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 2001 in early evening, i left my house in fairfield county, connecticut to go to work.  i managed a retail store at the time.   it was dark and the stars were out, as i pulled out of the driveway i noticed there were three white lights in the sky sitting together over my left shoulder as i drove the car facing to the north. they were the size of the planet venus when we are able to see it in the sky.  one seemed either further away or smaller than the other two.  they were just above the tree line along the road but in the distance i had no sense of how close they were. they were fairly bright and caught my eye. i thought they were stars.   as i made a few turns to get on the highway i noticed that the lights were still over my left shoulder but i was going east now so i thought they were lights on a plane possibly.   they stayed over my left shoulder the whole way on the highway as if they were following me.   i turned off the highway and was going west and the lights were still over my left shoulder in the same place in the sky.  i started thinking they were much more than lights.  after a few more turns which the lights made with me, i arrived at work.  i parked in front of the store and rushed in to get the other manager to come out to see the lights.  they stayed right in the sky where they were when i parked and hovered as my co-worker and i watched them for about 10 minutes.  then one after another they zoomed away and left no trail. the last one stayed for a few seconds longer then followed the others.  the smaller left first.  i had no missing time; i got to work on time.
content.summary: My friend witnessed these ufos on the way to work.

content.detailedDescription:
Estabamos dos compa���eras y yo, tomando unas fotos de la iglesia del barrio mandalay en caldas-antioquia. ya que se trataba de una investigacion que estabamos haciendo sobre dicho barrio. (investigaci���n no relacionada con ovnis).
minutos antes de llegar a la iglesia estaba lloviendo, despu���s escampo. cuando comenzamos a tomar las fotos, en la pantalla de la c���mara vimos el objeto y nos sorprendimos mucho, el cielo estaba muy nublado y gris, y s���lo hab���a un hueco por donde entraba la luz del sol (el sol se encontraba en otro punto). all��� en ese espacio, era donde staba ubicado el objeto, nos parec���a muy extra���o el color y la forma, nosotros no dudamos en decir que era un ovni, pero lo que nos llamaba la atenci���n era su forma y color,dentro del circulo no era normal, pues cambiaban las formas de adentro, ten���a una especie de "aura" de color rosado, y comenzamos a tomarle fotos, por un momento lo dejamos de ver y ya nos ibamos a retirar de all���, pero con la curiosidad de seguir viendolo, seguiamos mirando y alcanzamos a verlo mucho m���s lejos, as��� tambi���n le tomamos fotos.
despu���s de unos minutos m���s, lo volvimos a ver de la manera y cercan���a inicial, y decidimos grabarlo en video, hasta que se fue desapareciendo lentamente. (en el video se ve claramente). despu���s de eso, tron��� y comenzo una lluvia muy fuerte. 
despu���s, nos refugiamos para no mojarnos, quedamos at���nitas y queriamos seguir viendo, pero no volvi���.
content.summary: Estabamos tomando fotos a la iglesia de un barrio de caldas, y descubrimos algo muy extraño en el cielo, que no se movia pero si se desaparecia. tambien tenia colores extraños, no vistos antes en un objeto asi. rosado, negro. formas extrañas dentro.

content.detailedDescription:
I need to speak with someone from tn. mufon as i have recently moved fom virginia to tn. and after a month of living here i am photographing ufo's during the day again.  i can stand in my back yard and they are there. there are several in photos that look like the ones in virginia. now there is something different though...I keep getting round balls on the surface of the ground (different fom orbs) in my photos.  i put many of the virginia photos on a website fdinwidy7.Tripod.Com and the new tn photos on googles picasa photo editor:
http://picasaweb.Google.Com/dinwidy7/ufoseekupload?Feat=directlink
content.shape: Cylinder,  Disc,  Sphere,  Square,  Rectagular,  Other
content.summary: Several ufo's in 3 days of photographs

content.detailedDescription:
At 400 ponce de leon, the al yaarab shriner temple, at around 9pm waiting for the traffic to clear out after a rollerderby bout, looking north from the parking lot towards piedmont park my daughter (age 12) and i noted this object that we thought was a chopper taking off from the hospital. i realized there is no hospital in that direction as my daughter asked why it didn't blink. the object rose diagonally to the east, dropped came to a halt and moved back west and became brighter. from our vantage point it appeared to never go above the skyline or break the cloud ceiling. as it continued a short distance west it climbed, and grew brighter. it was then that i asked a group of people talking nearby if they would tell me if what i was seeing was real. one of them said it was a chopper and then had to quickly withdraw that opinion when the craft dropped down and east and appeared to flicker and vanish. the initial sighting was around a minute long.

then we joined the group in looking at the sky in that direction and making wise cracks to one another about spacemen. about 3���5 minutes passed and it appeared again low in the sky and began to rise straight up and list from side to side. people were saying it must be a bunch of balloons maybe, or a large kite. then the object moved very suddenly and rapidly to what appeared to be the north. it just seemed to get smaller and dimmer and be heading away from our pov. it rose and moved west and we lost site of it from a car pulling into the lot we were in and hitting us in the face with their headlights. 

again, talk of what that object could have been arose. not a hot air balloon. not an rc chopper/plane. no faa lights. halting and suddenly moving, not enough wind to carry a kite or push balloons around. very strange. we were all getting a little anxious as more people joined in who had been other parts of the lot and seen the same thing. 

there was air traffic overhead. but all were easily identified. jets passing through the cloud ceiling. blinking lights. we saw a helicopter. all of these other things in the sky were making this one even more odd. 

it returned a third time after about 5���7 minutes. this time coming in low from the west and gradually growing larger and brighter. again, it was perceived to be approaching. a passerby was stopped and shown the object that he identified also as a chopper and then also had to correct himself. that's no chopper, what is that? exactly. we watched for a minute as the object continued to move erratically and do things no plane or swamp gas could ever do. a commercial liner was flying in what to us looked to be the direction of the object but at the height of the clouds so we could see it moving in and out and its silo and know that object was a jet. as it came closer to the object the steady glow became a strobe briefly and it dropped straight down then moved east and accelerated and climbed.

we all we completely blown away by the last sighting and the group of about 10 were still scanning the sky to the north. there were a couple who insisted it be a chopper or maybe something else, but what? they couldn't say. everyone else was awestruck at what we think we had just been witness to. it really was a flying object that could not be identified with any amount of certainty by anyone who saw it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Single white object with occasional strobes that moved unlike any conventional fixed wing aircraft or chopper.

content.detailedDescription: Well this happen about a year ago and we were going on the street when we looked in the sky and there was this light that looked like a commet but it stayed still. it was around 3 in the afternoon and the sun was out so we thought well it might be a reflection, but up in the sky there couldn't  be anything that could stand  still that high and make this  light iand it stood still no matter what angle we shot at it. and i know i wasn't the only one watching as soon as i was taking pictures of this a lot more people started taking their cameras out. i don't now what this was and would like to know if you something about it. im kind of interested in what i sasw
content.summary: Very strange light that stayed still in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 8:50 last evening (4-17-09) i was leaving a friend's house in gulfport, florida and noticed what i thought to be a low flying aircraft coming almost directly over my vehicle.  i could
see clearly a triangle shape of lights with distinct solid red lights at the three corners and white blinking lights at the corners also. following this closely were what appeared to be three other sets of lights that didn't seem to be in the triangle shape. the objects were moving from the sw to the ne at a slow speed and probably below 5000 ft. altitude although it was hard to judge, but not very high. i have seen many aircraft at night and live in the landing pattern of macdill afb, so am very used to numerous aircraft types, civilian and military.  i am 58 and this was the first time i have seen something like this. i am not certain if i was seeing six distinct craft, or whether the triangle was one large one.  there was no sound that i detected, as should be the case at that altitude by normal aircraft of any type. i could not detect a solid shape to the triangle, but it was quite dark at the time and no moon.  i was looking out my driver side window and had stopped in the road to look at the lights.  the total time it was observed by me was approximately 30 seconds.
i've never seen a military formation with this much distance between them or with the strange lighting. as it was headed over downtown st. petersburg, it must have been viewed by many people.
content.summary: Over flight by unknown triangle craft or formation.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking out the trash and i happened to look up at the sky, and i saw this flying triangle. it had three white lights and had a silvery-grey or black body(the sun glare was preventing me from mostly seeing the body of the thing)and was making sharp turns worthy of an f-22 raptor jet. however, this craft looked more like a b-2 or the shape of the alleged aurora hypersonic airplane. after around a half-minute, it stopped making those turns and started to move away at a very fast speed.
content.summary: Silver flying triangle.

content.detailedDescription: At around 7:00pm 4-17-09 i looked out the kitchen window (its a western view) and saw what i thought was a cloud in a strange shape. so i went outside to look at it. i had a very clear view of the horizon and sunset what i saw was white and grey in color it was some sort of contrails miles long and very thick twisted  into a distinct shape of a double helix and was stayin in the twisted shape and not disapating. there was no sign of what made it. it lasted about a hour before it moved out of sight. a week before this at 8:00pm we hear several sonic booms.
content.summary: A huge contrail in the shape of a double helix.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my backyard around 10:30p the night of friday april 17, 2009 with a good friend and my 15 year-old son.  i happened to glance upward to the north and noticed a bright orange glowing light quickly traversing the sky from west to east.  all three of us watched the object as it gradually slowed and wobbled slightly in its course, flickered and dulled a bit and then moved due east until it disappeared on the eastern horizon.  

i am curious if any other monroe county or neighboring community member witnessed the sight.  it definitely was not a plane.  the color was distinctively orange and there were no flashing lights.  it was also larger in diameter and lower in the sky than a plane or satellite.   the sky was very clear and the temperature around 58 degrees.  my guess is it was a meteor.  however, the length of time in the sky as well as change of speed and course did leave us curious.

my son did attempt to record the incident with his cell phone but i am not sure how successful he was as i have yet to view the video.
content.summary: Orange glowing light moving west to east.

content.detailedDescription:
Looking at the moon from my window, noticed the lights which have been there before.
when i first noticed i immidately thought it was an aeroplane, but it did not move for a few hours.
there were flashing lights of red and green and golden which made me think of a plane. there were two objects, one below the other, the bottom one bigger and brighter. the top object/lights remained stationary whilst the bottom moved from left to right occationally.
i was fairly scared because i could not identify it as anything normal such as an aeroplane. i watched it for around wenty minutes then went inside out of fear of being alone.
i checked every so often for a while but the object remained, still flashing and then i went to bed.
content.summary: Flashing lights, 2 objects in sky, slight movement.

content.detailedDescription:
I was an electronics mechanic assigned to the control tower at the u.S. naval base at rota, spain. i daily checked with air controllers to see if any immediate repairs were needed. i entered the control tower at approximately 0830. two controllers were in the tower not paying any attention to a very large spherical object at the east end of the runway. it's hard to say how far away it was because i don't know the size and it is hard to say the size since i didn't know the distance but it was large. it appeared spherical but there was no shadow because it radiated a very white light. it was like looking at the sun but it didn't hurt my eyes. i ask if it showed up on radar and was told that the ground controlled approach radar was down for scheduled maintenance. i did see some pilots go to their planes on the apron to light up their radars but never did hear if they had radar acquisition. i had a strange urge to bow down to this thing. may say something about my mental stability. i mention it in order to record all that i remember.

i ask what in the hell it was and nobody knew. they said it was there at 0600 when the controllers woke up from their nap. they slept on watch as there was almost never any traffic after midnight. the exact arrival time is therefore unknown. i was told that it at one point ascended at an extreme rate of climb. near instantaneous to around 50,000 feet. moved slowly to the south east and hovered over the port area. we had both missile boats and fast attack boats. i hovered there for minutes then did the climb and slow drift to it's original position where i saw it. 

at around 1000 i went up to the tower to see if it was still there and the tower was full of naval officers including the c.O. of the base. there were no intelligence types that i saw. air ops, air traffic control and others who were assigned to the air terminal building. there were secretaries from around the building. at some point one of the officers ask if we should scramble the air force. the c.O. said that they would just laugh at us. 

i returned to work and checked periodically. after noon chow the object had moved to the southwest and hovered over the atlantic ocean until 1700 when i got off work.

one thing that may be related is a strange action by base security. i don't recall how much later but sometime later, maybe a month or more, the air traffic control division and the ground electronics division was called to base security. we were given a story about fissionable material being missing from the weapons department. we had to carry radiation dosemeters which nobody did. i ask why we were involved since we didn't have access to the weapons dept. and was told not to be a smart ass. 

the dates are approximate because there has been many years passed since the incident occurred. i will say that at the time i questioned whether the object was extra terrestrial or perhaps earthly and experimental.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Appeared at naval base in early hours. remained until after 1700.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend of my son noticed the strange light in the sky while he was walking to our house.  my son, his girlfriend, the friend who was walking to the house and myself went outside to watch the light.  it was stationary in the sky, fairly far away from us.  it seemed like it was over the southwest suburbs of chicago (perhaps interstate 55 and lemont road. it was at about a 40 degree angle in the sky.  it did not seem to be an airplane, since it did not move.  the light changed kept changing colors between white, red, blue and green.  the colors seemed to be rotating vertically rather than horizontily.  there seemed to be a beam of light coming out of the right side of the light.  

since the light was so far away, we could not make out any details.  we watched the light for about 20 minutes.  it did not move much during that time.  we finally just went back into the house.  i'm not sure what it was but it was curious.
content.summary: Unusual light in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
At 9:40 pm i ( 48 year old professional) was arriving home from picking my daughter up in evanston.  just prior to pulling the car into the garage, my 11 year old yelled from the back seat " oh crap- dad.. a ufo"  she was out of the car.  i thought perhaps she was just joking.  i got out of my vehicle to open the garage door as my remote was unresponsive.  i looked up over head and slightly north and observed four lights moving together northward.  they appeared to be about 3000 feet or less if they were the size commonly on aircraft.   the sky was very clear tonight as i could make out the big dipper immediately between me and the moving lights.  they were in a somewhat linear arrangement, like orion and a fourth light positioned left of the lead light.  i then hollered for my friend and son to come out and see this. i then notice two other lights trailing the four lights, but moving in a irregular, somewhat elliptical fashion across the sky.  by eliptical i do not mean long sweeping arch, but short, tightly curved sweeps across the sky.   my friend (a 53 year old professional) and  my 13 year old son both observed the lights moving across the sky and the additional two trailing lights.   we all agreed it was not a jet or jets.  no sound was heard.  the lights were white and steady. after five minutes or perhaps slightly less, the lights were so small we were no longer able to visually track them.  my daughter having the closest look thought thought the four light were together on a single unit, appearing somewhat invisible. like a big shape of four lights stuck together, but could not see the platform, but the lights kept rotating"

i have observed many satellites at night.  they were not satellites.. they were too near in the local sky and not moving in a precise linear arch.  they were not commercial jets, however. i am confident that they would have appeared on the ord -  chicago radar control as they were in class controlled airspace.
content.summary: 6 ufo lights moving north over evanston.

content.detailedDescription:
1. outside home looking at sky.  stars can be seen clearly but some light pollution--no overcast noticed.  aircraft seen in sky during this half-hour period:  1 (headed north) at approx 10k feet; 2 (headed north east) at approx 20k feet.  no aircraft visible while objects were visible.

2.  movement.  stare at 2 or 3 stars close together (about 10 degrees apart) and any nearby movement stands out.  each object seemed to move like a satellite in low orbit.

3.  satellite (have observed satellites before)

4. under closer visual observation object changed velocity (+/-) in a rapid jerky manner.  angular motion (+/-) was also rapid and jerky.  these deviations from what seemed to be a smooth orbital path were not obvious at first but quickly became apparent: the motion was very odd.  one went from west to east and then swerved back and headed north also (this might have been two objects).  using 8x50 binocs on the last object just revealed a point of light but brighter than the visual object.  all these observations were made relative to the nearest fixed star so there would be no illusion of motion.

5.  first time i have seen anything in the sky that appeared to do the impossible.  it was interesting.  i thought that with a steady hand i could mimic the motion (all objects basically moved the same way) with a laser pointer on a theater wide screen.  it seemed that the object was not under the influence of newtonian forces as you would expect of a physical object up in the sky--sort of like a 'cosmic' laser pointer.

6.  objects disappeared in distance approx 45 degrees above horizon.
content.summary: Approx. 6 objects moving erratically s to n very high alt horz to horz in approx. 5 min.

content.detailedDescription: on the date given i was a police officer attached to the trinidad and tobago police service. around 100 pm on the day in question i was in my living room having lunch, visibility was exceptional, the day was sunny as many other days since we have beautiful tropical weather, my wife looking out the open doorway in the kitchen towards the mountains approximately one mile away to the east of our home called out to me in a loud tone" mitch, come and look at this, what the hell is this", realizing her excitement i went to where she was standing when she pointed to the direction of the mountains where i saw this cigar shaped dull metallic object in the air, size i'd calculate because of distance could be 150ft in length, height approximately 40 ft there were no wings or any other projections attached to this object, which was slowly heading towards the mountains. i continued viewing this object for about 7 seconds whilst when it disappeared behind the mountain. i came to the conclusion that this object could not be any aircraft known to me and both my wife and myself had no idea what it could have been. after 22 years i still have that belief. except for my wife i have not  discussed the incident with anyone for fear of ridicule since in my small country people seem not to entertain those discussions.
content.summary: Cigar shaped, dull metallic, no wings, fuselage or external projections.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i came home from a seminar and noticed a light beam that came out of the western horizon and streaked across the entire sky toward the east. we said, northern lights? no because it was coming from the western horizon. milky way? no because it actually resembled the beam of a flashlight shining through clouds or something only on a much larger scale.

i went in the house and grabbed the camera (kodac easyshare 643 - 6 megapixel). i wanted to see if i could capture the light. i took 25 pictures of the sky, but when i viewed them on my computer the light didn't really show up. however, something else showed up that neither of us saw with our naked eye. it was round and appears to me like a globe. as i say, i never seen the object myself, but have it on a digital memory card. i have copied it to my computer.

when i went out to take the picture the light beam had shifted and was going from the west to the east south east instead of west to east.
content.summary: Trying to capture light beam in sky caught a globe shape.

content.detailedDescription:
I happened to be outside in my backyard at 9pm having a smoke and when i looked up at the stars and immediately saw three orbs that flew from south to north direction.  they were about at the height of a helicopter and the three orbs were flying in slight triangular formation, but not fully in sync as one or two would wobble out of formation briefly.

clearly, i knew it was not a aircraft with no flashing lights.  i see planes fly above from sfo everyday and the orbs were white, but not a star-bright type of light nor were they twinkling.

i knew immediately as i saw them that they were not birds or planes or evening a comet or shooting star and they produced no noise.  i've seen the difference of all of that at night and i am also not a big firm believer in ufos, but still don't know what i saw in those three orbs.
content.summary: 3 orb shaped objects flying over home in crocker amazon district.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on a bench outside of the greenhouse area on the grounds on the biltmore estate.  i saw a high-altitude passenger-type jet passing from east-to-west (i was looking north towards the main house) with the usual white contrail.  as the jet passed by, i noticed an object slightly above the contrail that appeared to be blinking/flashing in an irregular pattern.  it was approximately 45-50 degrees up from the horizon.

at first, i thought the object was another plane coming towards me (from my viewing angle), but as i watched it, i noticed that the object was stationary.  after a couple of minutes more, making sure that it wasn't moving, i attached a 70-300mm lens to my digital camera in order to snap some pictures.  as the object was essentially a point, the camera had a difficult time finding focus, so i manually focused to 'infinity' and snapped several pictures.  the pictures aren't terribly crisp (or, at least, it doesn't *appear* crisp to me), but i have several showing the object at varying levels of brightness.

i also got the attention of the two people in my party to verify that they saw the object and that it, indeed, was not moving.  i walked to a spot where i could align my sight of the object with a fixed-position structure (pergola on the garden grounds) on the ground in order to be certain that the object was not moving.  in the approximately 10 minutes of observation from this spot, the object did not appear to move at all.  during this entire event, the object continued to flash/blink in an irregular pattern.

our party continued to walk back up the path towards the main house.  i would periodically re-acquire the object at various times on the walk to the house.  i snapped a few more pictures with a less powerful 18-55mm lens, but i cannot find the object in those shots even though i know it was in the center of the frame.

i attempted to find the object after we concluded our tour, but cloud cover had increased making finding the object difficult/impossible (provided that it was still there).

i felt that the blinking/flashing was from light being reflected from the surface of a shiny object.  the blinking/flashing could have been due to rotation of the object, but it is (in my opinion) more likely due to thermals in the atmosphere.  i was a bit excited to see the object, and pleased that the people in my party observed it as well.  i'm not saying that what i saw was from another planet; rather, that i have no idea what it was.  it didn't behave like an airplane (it was stationary for long periods of time), it didn't behave like a balloon (again, stationary), venus (wrong spot in the sky...I think), or anything else that i'm aware of.  i suppose that it *could* have been a weather balloon...Regardless, i'd very much like to know what it was if anyone has information.
content.summary: Saw flashing object above contrail of passing jet.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home and i saw a flashing light, once i got home i was standing outside of my car, talking to a friend. then i looked up and saw two circle, disc shaped objects flying just above the tree tops. they had 6 dull green lights around the base and flew slowly. they were very quiet, but had a light humming sound. once they passed, i didnt see them again.
content.summary: It was a disc like flying object with 6 dull green lights around the bottom.

content.detailedDescription: I had just walked to my back door to have a cigarette on the back deck and i noticed a very bright red light traveling up the mountain right behind my house. originally, i thought it was the brake lights of a car traveling very fast up the road on the mountain. then i realize that the light was not on the road when it traveled straight up very fast to the top of the mountain and was still heading higher. at this time, i yelled for my daughter to come outside and see what i was looking at. she knew before she ever got outside what it was because we have had other sitings in the last year from our back deck. when she came out the light began to travel towards us. this was the first time that we both actually got a little nervous because it just kept coming closer to us just above the tree tops. i ran in to grab my camera and ran back out and it was still there just hovering about 100 yards away still above the tree tops. the light was extremely bright and the object made no noise. i took the picture and the flash went off on my camera. we then realized that the ducks down at the creek behind our house were quacking very loud and the dogs in the neighborhood were all barking. after, i took the picture and the flash went off the light seemed to began to vanish right before our eyes. i couldn't tell if the object was getting smaller, moving away, or just disappearing. within a matter of seconds the light had completely disappeared before us and then ducks and dogs seemed to quiet instantly. from where we were standing on the back deck if we were to hold up a quarter that would be about how big the light was. we continued to stay outside looking for it for about another 15 minutes but didnt see anything more. we have had other sightings including crafts zooming over the mountain stopping and hoovering while changing colors then disappearing and a single bright white light that flew over our house very low then returned a few minutes later to disappear right above us. this particular white light was a triangular, silent,silhouette. i have attached the picture i took with my cannon powershot a410. the light was alot closer, larger and brighter than what my camera picked up. maybe someone can zoom in on the light in the picture and get more detail about the object.
content.summary: Bright red silent light flying very low.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were sitting on our deck about 10p.M. on march 10, 2007 and we noticed there was this object moving rapidly in different directions and then it would stop and hover and then do these same movements again. as we watched we heard and saw two f-15's approaching this object one approached from the east and the other approached from the west and as they got close to this object it shot straight up and disappeared in 2 seconds. i have never seen anything move so quickly. my best friend lives near us and as she was leaving for work that night(works third shift) her and her husband saw the samething happening. there have been other sightings in this area and i am sure that there will be more. i am not surprised at all about seeing these ufos i am sure we are not the only planet in this vast solar system with life and to think we are is to me quite arrogant. i believe there have been space travelers for as long as man can remember. especially since they are evn mentioned in the bible.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Made quick movements sideways, up and down, zig zag motion.

content.detailedDescription:
In 1992 a ufo crashed into southhaven park in shirley long island.  many witnessed the event as it is near sunrise highway, a well traveled roadway.  the park was closed for three days.  brookhaven national labs was called in.  a large flatbed truck brought something large back to the lab.  my brother, who worked on the lab at the time, told me that they had an alien, alive, on the lab property.  he told me this shortly before he died in 2006.   he told the same thing to my mother, and his family in real time., at the time of it happening.  there are reports saying there there is film footage of the event.   the spot of the crash is still obvious from ariel view.   the trees are twisted and turned about.  some of them are bent.   and it is reported that there is no electro magnetic field where there should be there. 

in order to corroborate my sighting information i offer you this report from the paranormal investigative group. long island oddities:  i have also enclosed a picture of the twisted trees.

 	

southaven park - the crash

the most coherent information on southaven was located in the liufon press release on august 3 1998. the actual crash occurred at 7:00pm on nov. 24th, 1992. a man was driving east on sunrise highway heading toward william floyd parkway. there was a patch of trees separating sunrise from montauk hwy. to the south of sunrise he saw a large craft that he describes as, "tubular in shape with two large bright blue lights on each end with a bright white light in its center whose structure was composed of a dull metallic grey texture". he saw the object make a very tight right angle, cross the highway, and crash into the woods of southaven park. when it hit, the object emitted a dazzlingly white beam that was said to turn night to day for a moment.

the same man turned and came back on the other side of sunrise to backtrack and find the source of the crash. he saw helicopters near the exit to william floyd pkwy. neither the helicopters or the personnel that came to block off the westbound exit to william floyd bore any markings or insignia and the men were dressed in plain black. finally he went west on victory which was closed off later, and reached the second turn on gerard ave. this street and its neighbors would soon report all manner of electrical glitches, phone ringing with no one there, and tv static. at this time though our witness could see a huge fire back in the woods.

at the same time someone also driving east on sunrise saw an oval shaped object fly over the town dump hill, "on a descending course 30 degrees to the horizon which was leaving a green ionization trail as it passed". could this have been part of its crash trajectory? the oval craft or one like it may have been scouting out the local area because there was an incident "reported over islip town which were seen on the channel 12 news in march 1992 at the bagatelle road exit of the long island expressway".

some researchers say even now that there are areas of southaven that have the trees bent as if almost torn out of the ground at some point in their growth. on a scouting mission we think we found such a site. we also found a good aerial shot of the area that shows a large roundish area that has no trees at all. the photos are below.
content.summary: Ufo crashed at southhaven park in shirley long island.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night around 9:15 , i happened to look out my window .I'm on the 6 floor and have a perfect view of downtown knoxville and the river . coming up the river from west to east was what i first thought was a plane . it had strobing lights on both ends and a bright light in the center . as it passed over the building , it had no tail section and was completly silent . the altitude was probably around 200 feet or less . and its length was somewhere between 50 and 75 feet acrost , between the strobing lights . 
the total time of viewing it was maybe 6 secounds . when i first spotted it , it was about a half to three quarters of a mile away . 

the secound thing i saw was a white ball of light around 10 pm . about 30 degress above the horizion . traveling north to south , it was about 1/8 of an inch in diamater . and really moving speed wise it went from right to left in about a secound or two . i dont have any sat trak programs anymore so maybe it was a satilight . the distance from me to the object is unknown . 
i sure would like to know if anyone else saw these objects last night .
content.summary: More sightings over the tennessee river.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to have a smoke and was checking out the stars (first clear, warm night in a while).I was sitting on my steps facing south looking at saturn which was at about 70 degrees off the horizon when i noticed very dim almost foggy lights in a triangle formation traveling west to east. it was completely silent and moving very fast, but much lower, faster and larger than the usual air traffic coming to and from pittsburgh. this thing had no strobes or faa lights just three very faint white lights at each corner (about 90% sure it was one object) i would have never noticed this object if i had not been looking in that general direction! it was not a satellite, i see them often. i can���t stress enough; it was like it was ���almost��� invisible!
content.summary: Very dim, silent triangle flew over my house.
